body:
「空白区切りの数字を改行区切りに並べ替え」は `printf '%s\n'` (POSIX) で行けます。

```sh:
printf '%s\n' "${numbers[@]}" | sort -n | head -n 1
```

> 引用: [POSIX printf / EXTENDED DESCRIPTION 9](http://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/9699919799/utilities/printf.html#tag_20_94_13)
> 9. The *format* operand shall be reused as often as necessary to satisfy the *argument* operands.

参考: [bash - Is it normal for printf '%s\n' "${array[@]}" to print one line per array element? - Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39690037/is-it-normal-for-printf-s-n-array-to-print-one-line-per-array-element)

引用: POSIX printf / EXTENDED DESCRIPTION 9
9. The format operand shall be reused as often as necessary to satisfy the argument operands.

参考: bash - Is it normal for printf '%s\n' "${array[@]}" to print one line per array element? - Stack Overflow
